name: MagicExplorer
description: An automated browser agent system built with the Cangjie Magic framework, integrating Playwright via MCP for real-world web automation.

name: The challenge of dynamic binding
description: An exploration of dynamic binding in programming languages, highlighting its power, complexity, and impact on language design, performance, and reasoning

name: Building Your First Cangjie Application on OpenHarmony
description: A Step-by-Step Guide to Setting Up the Environment from Scratch and Completing a Cangjie Demo Project on OpenHarmony

name: Cangjie AI for Cursor, An AI-Aware Extension for the Cangjie Language
description: A Cursor extension that automatically injects Cangjie-specific context, toolchain conventions, and Context7 MCP documentation into AI prompts to improve code understanding and generation

name: Contract Mechanism Design in Cangjie and LLM Code Generation
description: How can contracts improve LLM-generated code quality? Dr. Bohua Zhan from Huawei 2012 Programming Language Lab presents groundbreaking research on integrating Design by Contract principles with large language model code generation using the Cangjie programming language.

name: Cangjie Workshop #41: Effect Handlers & Distributed Actor Framework
slug: Cangjie Workshop 41 Effect Handlers and Distributed Actor Framework
description: In this session, researchers from Huawei's Programming Language Lab in Edinburgh share cutting-edge features for concurrent and distributed programming in Cangjie.

name: Cangjie Programming 101 English Digital Textbook
description: Exciting news for the global developer community! The official English edition of the Cangjie Programming digital textbook is now live on Huawei ICT Academy.
